name: typescript-rollup-project
description: A bootstrap for TypeScript + Rollup projects

scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:cleancss && npm run build:static && npm run build:node-modules
scripts.build:cleancss: for CSS in ./styles/*.css; do INPUT_CSS_PATH=$CSS npm run build:cleancss:partial; done
scripts.watch:cleancss: chokidar --initial --verbose "styles/*.css" -c "if [[ '{event}' = 'change' || '{event}' = 'add' ]]; then INPUT_CSS_PATH="{path}" npm run build:cleancss; fi;"
scripts.watch:cleancss:partial: chokidar --verbose "styles/shared/**/*.css" -c "if [[ '{event}' = 'change' || '{event}' = 'add' ]]; then npm run build:cleancss:partial; fi;"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel watch:cleancss watch:cleancss:partial 'watch:tsc -- --preserveWatchOutput' watch:rollup watch:static watch:node-modules serve
